title: 106 How to Meditate Like a Zen Monk in a Fraction of the Time with Bill Harris
description:
"Awareness provides the solution to every human problem that has a solution." - Bill Harris
If you enjoyed this interview, check out show notes and more at www.lewishowes.com/106.
